column1: #text=Today I took a trip to the library .
#text=The library is so much fun because there are so many different books to see there .
#text=When I got to the library I walked up and down the aisles looking for the perfect book for me .
#text=I wanted to read a book about horses or basketball .
#text=I asked the librarian to help me find one .
#text=She looked on her computer and found a great book about horses but it had already been taken home by someone else .
#text=So she looked again and found a cool book about basketball .
#text=She went with me to the shelf and helped me find the book .
#text=After I got the book off of the shelf , I took it over to the counter and gave it to a lady behind the desk .
#text=I gave her the card and she scanned it and my book .
#text=Then she gave me a slip of paper that said I needed to bring the book back in two weeks .
#text=I was very excited to leave the library with a book to read about basketball !
